cosmos.question: I am big and bright, shining in the day. I give Earth light and help plants grow. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very, very hot!
☀️ You need sunglasses to look at me.
🌎 The planets orbit around me.

cosmos.question: I shine at night, but I have no light of my own. I reflect the Sun's light. What am I?

hints.text: 🐺 Some animals howl at me.
🧀 Some people think I am made of cheese.
🌎 I orbit around Earth.

cosmos.question: I am a giant ball of gas that makes light and heat. I am very far away. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I twinkle at night.
🔥 I am made of hydrogen and helium.
🌌 The Sun is one of me.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that makes a picture in the sky. You might see a bear or a hunter in me. What am I?

hints.text: 📍 People use me to navigate.
✨ I am made up of many stars.
🐻 The Big Dipper is part of one of me.

cosmos.question: I am the planet we live on. I am covered in water and land. What am I?

hints.text: 🌍 I am the third planet from the sun.
🌱 Plants and animals live on me.
💧 I am sometimes called the 'Blue Planet'.

cosmos.question: I am a ball of rock and ice that flies through space. When I get close to the Sun, I grow a tail. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ Some people think I brought water to Earth.
❄️ I am often described as a 'dirty snowball'.
💫 You can sometimes see me with the naked eye.

cosmos.question: I am a group of billions of stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. Our Sun is part of one. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I can be spiral, elliptical, or irregular.
🌌 I am much bigger than a solar system.
🥛 Our solar system is in the Milky Way, which is an example of me.

cosmos.question: I am a large group of planetary systems, stars, gas, dust and dark matter, held together by gravity. I am constantly expanding. What am I?

hints.text: 🔭 I contain many Galaxies
💥 I started with a big event
♾️ I may be infinite

cosmos.question: I am the force that keeps the planets in orbit around the Sun. I also keep you on the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 An apple falling from a tree demonstrates me.
⚖️ I depend on mass.
⬇️ I always pull things downwards (on Earth).

cosmos.question: I am a place in space where gravity is so strong that nothing, not even light, can escape. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I am invisible.
🌀 I can warp space and time.
🕳️ I am the result of some stars collapsing.

transport.question: I have wheels and carry people around town, but I'm not a car. What am I?

hints.text: 🚌 I often have a number on the front.
🛑 I stop frequently to let people on and off.
🏫 Sometimes they are yellow.

transport.question: I float on the water, but I'm not a duck. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I can be big or small and used for leisure or work.
⚓ I often have an anchor.
🚢 Pirates might sail on me.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you use pedals to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 🚴‍♀️ You need to balance when riding me.
🔔 I might have a bell so people can hear you coming.
🛣️ You can ride me on a bike path

transport.question: I travel on tracks and carry lots of people or cargo. What am I?

hints.text: 🚂 I make a 'choo-choo' sound.
🛤️ I travel between stations.
🚊 I often have many carriages attached.

transport.question: I fly high in the sky and take people to far-away places. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I'm bigger than a bird.
✈️ I have wings and engines.
💺 You sit inside me to travel.

transport.question: I'm like a car, but I can carry lots of things in the back. What am I?

hints.text: 📦 I am bigger than a car.
🚧 I often deliver things to shops.
🚚 I can have a very large trailer.

transport.question: I can fly straight up, but I don't have wings like an airplane. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I have spinning blades on top.
🚨 I am sometimes used for rescue missions.
➕ I can hover in the air.

transport.question: I travel under the city, carrying people quickly from place to place. What am I?

hints.text: 🚇 I don't drive on roads.
💡 There are tunnels where I drive
🎫 You need a ticket to ride.

transport.question: I am a vehicle for snow. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I can take more than one person.
⛷️ I can be used to pull skiiers
🗻 I have tracks instead of wheels.

transport.question: I need a ramp to get in. What am I?

hints.text: 🧑‍🦽 I am inclusive for the disabled
🚍 I am a big vehicle
📍 I can be found on any street
